name: Lincoln Heist
description:
Lincol Heist is a first-person stealh  game  with puzzle elements. The player takes the role of thief that breaks in a museum in Washington DC, as he has been tasked to steal the gun that was used to murder Lincoln. The museum is well secured and the player will have to get throught all rooms without being detected and finish his mission.

CONTROLS:

-W,A,S,D: Movement of the character.

-Shift: Run.

-Control: Crouch

-P: Stop the game.

-Space: Jump

-E: Open doors

MADE BY:

  • Sergi Hernandez Cort
  • Àlex Jiménez i Soto
  • Iñaki Lemiechevsky Blanco
  • Valentin-Vasile Goga
  • Kristóf Neumann Csulak
  • Aleix Abel Calzada
